scripts.export:pdf: pandoc --pdf-engine=weasyprint --css pdf-print.css "2025-12-01 - Microsoft - Web Developer UI - Remote.md" -o "Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.pdf"
scripts.export:docx: pandoc --reference-doc docx-reference.docx "2025-12-01 - Microsoft - Web Developer UI - Remote.md" -o "Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.docx"
